# M06 Pandas

## Topics

-   Introduce Pandas and its relationship to NumPy
-   Understand difference between Series and DataFrames
-   Understand role of indexes in Pandas
-   Review fundamental methods in Pandas

## Readings

### Required

-   [McKinney 2023, Chapter 5: Getting Started with Pandas](https://wesmckinney.com/book/pandas-basics)
-   [Getting Started in Pandas (Official)](https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/getting_started/index.html#getting-started)
